20110102161104.000|20110102161105.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110102161105.000|20110102161105.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110102161105.000|20110102161108.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110102161108.000|20110102161108.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110102161108.000|20110102161111.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110102161111.000|20110102161111.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110102161111.000|20110102161114.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.

20110102161114.000|20110102161114.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110102161114.000|20110102161117.000|CC1|         young adults.

20110102161117.000|20110102161119.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110102161119.000|20110102161119.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110102161119.000|20110102161122.000|CC1|          thioridazine

20110102161131.000|20110102161134.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes.
